question: This state's Chief Minister inaugurated a special court at Cheirap Court Complex to try drug-related cases.
explanation: Manipur Chief Minister Biren Singh inaugurated a special court at Cheirap Court Complex in Imphal West district to try drug-related cases. The fast-track court will facilitate the speedy trial of offences relating to narcotic drugs and psychotropic substances. Similar court to try Crime Against Women was also inaugurated by the chief minister on June 27 last.
